alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Lafayette; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 31 at 2:07PM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...In Mississippi, Tippah, Alcorn and Lafayette Counties. In Tennessee, McNairy and Hardin Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
